channel.title: How i put mesage under my text (like people)
channel.description:
how can i put a text message under the text message i text?? ?? ?? ?? and how can i put a picture under my name ??
??
??
?? please text back

item.title: How i put mesage under my text (like people)
item.dc:creator: @killah246 Killah246
item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

You earn a picture under your name.
Go to ‘Profile’
Then on the left hand side go to ‘Forum Profile Information’ and edit the signature

Read full topic
item.source: How i put mesage under my text (like people)
